summary: An opulent dwemer tower with an open feel seated upon a mountaintop
descriptionHtml:
This mod is potentially a WIP if there's any interest in it. I made it as a place for myself to use and fit the theme of my magey character.

----------------------------------------------------------------
*UPDATES DELAYED, BUT STILL IN THE WORKS*
7/12/2014
I haven't given up on this project but it could be some time before I'm able to put in all the updates I want to due to certain events going on.
----------------------------------------------------------------

NO DLC required

House includes:

13 mannequins

9 "Normal" storage containers

Custom Storage for: Weapons, Armor, Scrolls, Keys, Potions, Ingredients, Food, Crafting Materials, and misc objects

About 80-100 books worth of bookshelves (though I recommend unlimited bookshelves by da5id2701, as it will vastly increase that number here and pretty much everywhere else in the game.)

Custom Displays for Vanilla dragon priest masks, the vanilla elder scroll, the sigil stone from the conjuration mastery quest, and all the daedric artifacts.

All the shrines of the divines

Crafting Stations Including: An alchemy Table, an enchanting table, a forge, a workbench, a tanning rack, a sharpening wheel, a cooking pot.

Oh, and time based interior lighting cause REAL, ACTUAL SEE THROUGH WINDOWS.
author: Whitenoise
